name: You are a true hero
description:
This is the result of our first game jam. Be kind (:

You are the designated hero to protect the people from evil monsters, thankfully the narrator is here to help you, show us your bravery and good luck !

Programming : Benoit TOTH

Art : Laetitia BRUN "You can follow me @laeti_oursbrun on Instagram !! ( I mostly do fantasy character design/ illustration, and i swear it’s better than this game BECAUSE I HAVE MORE TIME x’)"

Thanks to François for his voice and our friends for their ideas

Made with Unity
